<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Draws a line of a given color between two 3D positions. Command has to be executed each frame. Use [[onEachFrame]] or [[addMissionEventHandler]] "Draw3D".

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''drawLine3D''' [start, end, color]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [start, end, color]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> start: [[PositionAGL]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> end: [[PositionAGL]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onEachFrame]] {
	[[drawLine3D]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]], [[getPos]] [[cursorTarget]], [1,1,1,1]];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[drawIcon3D]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on August 31, 2013</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">As command syntax indicates, this command expects starting and ending position in format [[PositionAGL]] meaning that over the land it expects [[PositionATL]] and over the sea [[PositionASLW]]. Use additional [[ASLToAGL]] and [[AGLToASL]] commands wherever is necessary. 

<code>[[addMissionEventHandler]] ["Draw3D", {
	[[drawLine3D]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[ASLToAGL]] [[eyePos]] soldier1, [[ASLToAGL]] [[eyePos]] soldier2, [1,0,0,1]];
}];</code>


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
